Package ca.mcgill.hs.plugin

Interface Summary
DataPacket Interface implemented by all data packet classes contained within InputPlugin implementations.
Plugin A simple interface describing the behaviour of plugins, both input and output.
 

Class Summary
BluetoothLogger Logs observable bluetooth devices
BluetoothLogger.BluetoothPacket  
FileOutput An OutputPlugin which writes data to files.
GPSLogger An InputPlugin which gets data from the GPS receiver.
GPSLogger.GPSPacket  
GSMLogger  
GSMLogger.GSMPacket  
InputPlugin Abstract class to be extended by all InputPlugins.
LocationClusterer Estimates a users' location based on wifi and gps signals.
OutputPlugin Abstract class to be extended by all OutputPlugins.
PluginFactory  
ScreenOutput This output plugin takes data from a ReadableByteChannel and outputs it to the Android's logcat.
SensorLogger An InputPlugin which gets data from the phone's hardware sensors.
SensorLogger.SensorPacket  
SimpleClassifierPlugin Currently classifies motion status into moving or lingering based on a simple threshold over a moving average of the accelerometer magnitudes.
SimpleClassifierPlugin.ClassifierThread  
TestMagOutputPlugin  
WifiLogger An InputPlugin which gets data from the wifi base stations that are currently in listening range.
WifiLogger.WifiPacket
